name: Ungeo
description: a public cloud provider in China
overview:
UnGeo is a provider of public cloud services for the China market, targeting both domestic businesses and foreign companies that need high-speed access to the market.

UnGeo provides an infrastructure web services platform in the cloud for any organization who depends on IT for its operation in a significant way, while providing a business strategy in the form of partnership to disruptive technology providers who want to tap Chinese market. UnGeo aims to: 1) help foreign emerging and disruptive technology providers to enter Chinese market via various partnerships, so that they do not need to deal with the traditional hassles in entering a foreign market, such as looking for a partner or setting up a branch, and the operational tasks like marketing, sales & taxes, customer support, localization, and protection from IP infringement and piracy, etc.. 2) help individual developers that have disruptive technology ideas to utilize UnGeo’s cloud platform in developing, launching, and managing a technology business. 3) ultimately, help companies of all sizes to take advantage of these disruptive technologies via UnGeo Cloud in meeting their IT needs at lower costs and better service.
